Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
AI - immediate feedback during the completion of assignments. Compares your work to the rubric better than a teacher would/chooses to. 
Teacher - delayed feedback, and sometimes very generic. It does not allow as much opportunity for learning.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response:
AI - confident, developed, and on the right track
Teacher - confused, neglected, left with questions

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response:
AI provides great feedback when you specify what you would like feedback on. 
I often request specific feedback from teachers when I submit an assignment; the feedback I receive is vague and lacks detail/effort.
